header.ALLCORR: Congratulations, you can now participate in the lottery
header.CONTACT: Fill out your contact information below, we will only use them to contact you if you are drawn

nameValidation.minlength: Name must at least be {{requiredLength}} characters long
nameValidation.maxlength: Name must be less than {{requiredLength}} characters

disclaimers.common: By participating in this quiz, you accept that we will register your contact information (name and mobile number) exclusively for the purpose of administering the quiz and drawing a winner. The winner will be contacted via text message during the event, and the prize must be collected before the event ends. Prizes will not be sent afterwards. All contact information will be deleted immediately after the event ends and will not be disclosed, distributed or used for any other purpose.
disclaimers.fb:
By participating in this quiz, you accept that we will register your contact information (name and email) exclusively for the purpose of administering the quiz and drawing a winner. All contact information will be deleted immediately after the quiz concludes and will not be disclosed, distributed or used for any other purpose. 

This competition is not sponsored, endorsed by or otherwise associated with Meta.
